messages.title: Fairer Taxes: £700 back in your pocket
messages.content: Under the Lib Dems you will not pay tax on the first £10,000 you earn. This will mean middle and low income earners paying £700 less tax.

messages.title: The Lib Dem Difference
messages.content: We will also restore the pensions' earnings link and provide fair pay for our front line armed forces. And we've a fully costed plan to do it.

messages.title: A fair start for every child
messages.content: Every child will have a guarantee of a fair start in life. We will put more money into schools and spend it on what matters. We will make class sizes smaller and we will abolish tuition fees. We can pay for this by scrapping wasteful education programmes and reforming tax. So that regardless of background every child in Britain will have the chance to reach their full potential.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan to not tax the first £10,000 of income, saving middle and low income earners £700 in tax, by closing loopholes allowing millionaires to pay less tax and cutting tax relief for the super rich.
Provide fair pay for front line armed forces with a fully costed plan.
Guarantee a fair start for every child by investing more in schools, reducing class sizes, abolishing tuition fees, and funding this by cutting wasteful educations programmes and tax reform.

issues.education: Investing in schools, reducing class sizes and abolishing tuition fees.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet criticizes Gordon Brown's record, mentioning issues such as the Iraq War, actions on MPs’ expenses, and the impact on local post offices and small businesses.
